name: Corona Crackdown
description:
Prototype of a high-flying, fast-paced, physics based shooter.  Very rough around the edges for now, but should get some more polish and content soon.  

Made for the Simple Game Jam 4 - A Lot of PEW PEW!!

Use WASD to move around, Space to jump. Q to switch weapons. Escape to leave the game.  

Direction, Programming, and Design by Connor Robb

Sound and Music by Anne Robb

3D Modeling by Maddy Robb and Connor Robb
